Title: Relates to monies received and expenditures made by a party committee or constituted committee
Summary: Relates to monies received and expenditures made by a party committee or constituted committee; such monies shall not be transferred or contributed unless it is to the segregated account of another party committee or constituted committee to be used only for non-candidate expenditures.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to monies received and expenditures made by a party committee or constituted committee
